name: ____ send you a link
description:
a mysterious link; a weird program that you can't rid of. 

==========================================

____ send you a link is a yume nikki fangame made for the dream diary jam 4

currently, there is 3 main worlds and 6 secondary worlds to explore, and 3 effects to collect.

the game has no ending for now, and there's a lot of incomplete things, but i'll update it as soon as i can so please bear with me :)

PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE FIXED VERSION! i fixed some things that i forgot in the first upload, oooops!

HOW TO PLAY: 

arrow keys: move

z/enter: interact

x: menu

shift/num 1: effect action

num 9: return to bedroom (you can also do it via menu)

use the computer to travel to the nexus~
